Address: 58 Zealandia Road West Croydon North VIC 3136
Description:
Exciting Parkside Opportunity
First homebuyers, renovators and investors, an exciting opportunity awaits you with this neat brick veneer home. On an easy 409 m2 (approx.) block, in a quiet no-through road, with a beautiful aspect overlooking scenic Warrien Reserve, playground and walking trail. With minimal work to be done before moving in, you can add your touch then - move in or lease out. This prized address is close to Luther College, primary schools, transport, child care, EastLink, Croydon Central and Chirnside shopping. A large single carport and a covered verandah welcome you into a comfortable, light-filled interior enhanced by modern decor, an alarm, scenic leafy outlooks and built-in storage. Discover the 2 private bedrooms, large bathroom and laundry. Formerly a 3 bedroom home, the master bedroom is huge and offers the potential to split and re-create the third bedroom.
A spacious lounge room featuring gas heating and air-conditioning, flows through to a tidy open plan kitchen appointed with an electric oven and stove. The serene, private garden boasts 2 garden sheds and is anticipating your vision for a deck (STCA) or landscaping.
Donna Walpole : 0421 997 827

Description:
Modern Living with Supreme Convenience
For a modern lifestyle or investment with total convenience, you must see this stylish, young 2-storey residence, It's hidden back from the road, in a small block of 6, and will delight first homebuyers, retirees or investors. Sell your car or park it in the remote single garage, because this no-through road is just 400 metres (approx.) from Exeter village, Coles, transport, Child Care and Brushy Park Creek. Discover effortless style and comfort, from the contemporary carpets and window furnishings, to the ducted heating and split system. Three double bedrooms (BIRs), a lovely 2-way bathroom (master with ensuite-effect access) and separate toilet are upstairs. A ground floor powder room/2nd toilet is also handy. Cooking will be a breeze in the beautiful kitchen appointed with s/s appliances, breakfast bar and ample storage. Relax in the inviting lounge room, or step out from the good-sized family/meals area and entertain friends in the private, low-maintenance landscaped garden. Plus: off street car space and shed. Close to Village School Primary, Chirnside Shopping Centre, Oxley College and EastLink. Call now!
Lee Fenech : 0410 426 400

Description:
Discover Young, Custom-Designed Luxury
Imagine a young custom-designed residence that delivers you a luxurious indoor/outdoor lifestyle. Set on an easy 555 m2 (approx.) corner block, amidst manicured landscaped gardens, this one owner dream is near Luther College, Yarra Valley Grammar, transport, McAdam Square, EastLink and Yarra Rd Primary. Sweeping views and a timber-lined verandah will enchant you, as will the 2 living zones, high ceilings, porcelain tiles, granite benchtops and bespoke window furnishings. Solar panels, ducted heating, split system, tinted windows (most windows) and ducted vacuum ensure your comfort. The parent's wing has a formal lounge/dining, study/nursery and master with WIR and double spa ensuite. Two double bedrooms (BIRs) and a family bathroom are in the children's wing. Delight in a custom-built, high end granite and s/s Neff kitchen showcasing butler's pantry, integrated dishwasher, ducted dust pan and insinkerator. The big family/meals with 6-panel bay window and Jetmaster is a sensational entertainer; opening to the winter courtyard and the summer courtyard with mains gas BBQ and glass awning. Plus: water storage and auto watering system.
Garrison Pearse : 0417 170 265

Description:
Family Entertainer with room to play!
When “Live, Laugh, Eat, Relax, and Enjoy” come to mind you know you’ve found a home which embraces the essences of life. With a large, stylish and well-appointed kitchen at the heart of the home looking over the warm polished floors of the open family room, complete with feature gas log fire, and out to the adjoining impressive entertaining area decked, covered, and set-up for all year around entertaining – this home is a pleasing winner! In a floorplan appealing to any family, there are four generous, light-filled bedrooms plus a convenient study; the Master Suite upstairs features a superb double door walk-in robe, as well as a stylish ensuite, and the benefits of a spacious rumpus/retreat adjoining. And equally with family in mind this property has an abundance of car parking space for cars or “toys” alike with a generous driveway leading to a tandem carport, and beyond a double garage / shed. A large and level backyard for outdoor fun completes the family-picture. All packaged on a hard-to-find 894m2 block of land, and situated in a great location with easy reach to shops, schools, transport, and equally to the delights of the Yarra Valley as well as the convenience and benefits of Eastland and Eastlink. This family entertainer is a home to be proud of!

Description:
LUXURY! LOCATION! LIFESTYLE! Topped with serenity!
You can have it all with this distinctive architecturally designed executive home.
Cathedral ceilings filling the quality interior with natural light throughout.
Robertson inspired brick fireplace flowing into large undercover entertaining area and private garden.
Tiled formal entrance with storage opening up to impressive formal living/dining.
Warm polished floorboards carry you to 3 separate living zones . Vast master with full ensuite and further 4 robed bedrooms.
Entertaining areas and quiet places of retreat make this a home with endless offerings.
Set upon over a quarter of an acre within the birts hill precinct, that will link you to the lifestyle you desire Yarra valley, Dandenongs and more at your doorstep!
Features:
• Ducted heating and refrigerated cooling
• Large open fireplace
• Wet bar and endless storage
• 3 large water tanks, LED lighting
• Plentiful parking double remote garage
• Ideal family neighbourhood
• Illustrious school zoned
• Minutes from amenities including McAdam square, public transport and Eastlink.
Call Multisell today to arrange your inspection.
Please note that our Open House Inspections may be manned by the owners or a buyer agent that does not communicate directly with the Vendors, so your questions and offers will be delivered directly online to the Seller for response within 24hrs. We trust you will find this a safer way to buy & sell.
All property details shown are correct at time of publishing. Some properties may have been sold in the preceding 24 hours and we recommend that you confirm open for inspection times with the listing agent direct or the listing office.

Description:
Gorgeous Family Home with an Entertaining Focus
Closing Date Sale: Wednesday 27th April at 6:00pm (unless sold prior)
Set in a tightly-held cul-de-sac on 752sqm (approx.) near Hochkins Ridge Reserve, this well-presented family home offers generous living spaces and luxurious appointments throughout.
The floorplan is well-zoned, thoughtfully designed to maximise entertaining options. The freshly painted interior boasts multiple living areas which extend to a covered outdoor setting with an enclosed spa. Each of these spaces is overseen by a stylishly renovated kitchen with stone benches and stainless-steel appliances.
The home also features two new bathrooms that service the bedrooms including an ensuite to the private master also equipped with a large WIR and glorious bay window.
The perfect family plan, the location adds further value close to premier schools such as Yarra Valley Grammar, Yarra Road Primary and Luther College
Additional Features:
*New Braemar 6-star energy rated GDH unit
*2 energy efficient air conditioning units
*Switchboard upgraded, safety switch installed
*Spacious laundry with handy outdoor access
*2 remote double garage doors with shelving
*Neatly manicured garden with cubby house
*Short drive to Eastland, EastLink & Costco

Description:
***UNDER CONTRACT***
Exceptional family living is at the heart of this terrific home offering flexible interior spaces, focusing on large families, blended or multi generational living.
- The entry foyer is a welcoming introduction followed by the study, inviting living room and dining room.
- The centre piece is the recently modernised kitchen-breakfast bar and informal meals area with bi folds opening into the substantial family room with kitchenette. Adjoining this zone is a robed bedroom with ensuite.
- With two access points from within the home, the large undercover alfresco retreat is the perfect place to unwind with family and friends.
- Upstairs provides 4 robed additional bedrooms, highlighted by the brand new modern glamorous ensuite, BIR and WIR to the main bedroom plus the family bathroom.
- A host of extras include the year round comfort of reverse cycle ducted heating-cooling, gas ducted heating, 2 split system air conditioners. New stone bench tops in the kitchen, new powder room and laundry, abundant internal storage plus an auto double garage.
- Desirable and peaceful Court, walk to Croydon Hills Primary school, Luther College and Good Shepherd, handy to Yarra Valley Grammar and popular McAdam Square. Short commute to Chirnside Park shopping centre, Croydon shopping precinct and station as well as Lilydale shopping hub and in the other direction Eastland plus Eastlink.

Description:
Family Haven for Relaxed Modern Living
In a quiet court and recently renovated to a very high standard, this single-level 4 bedroom home is absolute bliss for family buyers in an exclusive location close to Wonga Park.
This light-filled home has room to move with separate lounge and family rooms occupying opposite ends of the home, providing independent entertaining spaces for adults and children, complemented by a large, north-facing backyard garden and a covered alfresco deck with bistro blinds. Currently used as a home office, the formal dining room is a light-filled area that you can tailor to your lifestyle.
Illuminated by a skylight, the kitchen is the heart of the home, featuring a glass splashback, Caesarstone bench tops, soft-close drawers and abundant cabinetry, equipped with a wall oven, Everdure induction cooktop and a Beko dishwasher.
Generously proportioned, the 4 carpeted bedrooms with triple built-in robes are serviced by 2 beautiful modern bathrooms including an ensuite adjoining the master bedroom, complete with a walk-in wardrobe.
Boasting new carpets, flooring, curtains/blinds and freshly painted inside and out, further highlights include: an open fireplace, gas ducted heating, reverse cycle split system, ceiling fans, ducted vacuum, exceptional storage, cubby house/shed and a double garage with a remote-controlled door, internal access and a rear roller door extending to a parking area suitable for a trailer, caravan, etc.
Walking distance to buses and Yarra Road Primary School, this idyllic family haven is close to Yarra Valley Grammar, Luther College, Croydon Hills Primary School, Hochkins Ridge Flora Reserve and local shops, also handy to Chirnside Park and Eastland shopping centres.

Description:
Family Gem Near Prestigious Schools
With a refreshed interior and superior position, this four bedroom beauty should not be overlooked for both value and potential. Sited on 1060sqm (approx.), the home is close to Chirnside Park Shopping Centre, Eastland Shopping Centre, Yarra Valley Grammar, Luther College and a variety of other primary and secondary schools, making it a fantastic option for a large or growing family.
The layout is truly superb - spacious and naturally bright with two large living areas and private sleeping quarters. Generous bedrooms are a key feature of this home, two of them robed, the master equipped with a walk-thru robe to an ensuite. A good sized backyard completes it all, finished with a covered patio for outdoor entertaining.
Additional Features:
*Neat kitchen with gas cooktop, double oven
*1x gas wall heater with reverse cycle air con
*Dbl garage, carpets & tiles, separate toilet
*Easy walk to Warrien & Birt's Hill Reserves
*Short drive to EastLink, Eastland & Costco
*Walking distance to Croydon Station

Description:
***UNDER CONTRACT***
SETSALE: Tuesday 26th April @ 5pm (Unless Sold Prior)
You will feel instantly at home as this inviting and spacious cottage embraces you with its charm along with the pretty WB exterior, delightful light infused interior, terrific undercover alfresco deck and low maintenance private yard.
- Enjoy the winter appeal of the open fire place in the lounge, big kitchen-meals, generous family room plus B.I bar with French doors connecting to outdoor retreat and garden.
- Providing 3 robed bedrooms incorporating zoned main bedroom with spa ensuite, 2nd ensuite shared by the two additional bedrooms, study, mud room and 2 WCs plus a carport.
- Selected pine polished floor boards, gas heater and a B.I air conditioner provide year round comfort.
- Nestled on an easy to look after 493m2 approx, on its own title and no body corp.
- Numerous local attractions, walk to the Croydon North Plaza, Village Primary school, bus stop only metres way, Griff Hunt reserve, Hochkins Ridge Flora reserve and parklands. Handy to Chirnside Park shopping centre, Croydon Main Street shops and station along with the recently upgraded and expanded Eastland and rail, with easy access to Eastlink

Description:
***UNDER CONTRACT***
Generous light infused, immaculate interior, lovely northerly alfresco sanctuary and appealing location are all elements which will immediately attract families.
- Spacious proportions and comfort are in abundance in this welcoming home featuring gas ducted heating, ducted vacuum, B.I air conditioner and a walk in pantry.
- Offering two living-entertaining zones highlighting the living-dining room, kitchen connects with the meals and family zone merging onto the covered outdoor area. This entire zone due to its aspect enjoys the winter warmth of the sun.
- Providing four robed bedrooms including the main bedroom with WIR and ensuite, the light filled spacious bathroom services the additional bedrooms.
- There is an auto large double garage with workshop space.
- This location always holds its appeal as the original owner can verify, walk to Yarra Road Primary and buses, Power Street Flora Reserve is diagonally opposite. Close proximity to Yarra Valley Grammar, Luther College, Good Shepherd and McAdam Square. Easy commute to Eastland, Croydon Shops and stations, also Eastlink.

Address: 5/73 Bonnie View Road Croydon North VIC 3136
Description:
Quality Craftsmanship, Creative Family Living
Exuding the best of modern design and style, this exceptional family home showcases sophisticated quality amidst tranquil bushland surrounds. A discreet presence tucked amongst a handful of prestige homes, the 3 bedroom/2 bathroom layout enjoys the natural warmth of Spotted Gum, plantation shutters and Corian bench tops across 2 luxurious levels; the upper bathed in northerly light and with the flexibility of a 4th bedroom or 2nd living zone and the lower, leading the way in versatile family living with a guest bedroom, lavishly fitted with a WIR and ensuite. Sumptuous indoor/outdoor entertaining is delivered via stacking doors that retract to reveal a Merbau deck and pergola, bordered by Asian-inspired gardens. The secure yard also comprises a water tank (plumbed to the toilets) and garden shed. Discover the study nook, gourmet kitchen with waterfall benchtops, stainless steel appliances and soft close cabinetry, bathrooms with full-height porcelain tiling, LED lighting, square-set cornices, ducted heating, split-system cooling, garage with internal access and off-street parking. Near shops, transport, Yarra Valley Grammar, Luther College, Eastland and Eastlink.
Donna Walpole : 0421 997 827

Description:
Destined for an Exciting Future
Constructed in the late 1800's, "Linden" presents an absolutely enticing opportunity for a sympathetic buyer to take a glorious past and turn it into a brighter future.
Enjoying a generous 1,440.4sqm (approx.) allotment, it is set within a whisper quiet court that lends a rare tranquility. Originally built for Eliza Sharp, innkeeper of the then nearby Prince of Wales Hotel, there is little doubt that in its day "Linden" would have been an imposing and majestic principal house.
Awaiting transformation within heritage guidelines, an original facade hides grand proportions and a flexible layout enhanced with many retained period features. Ideal for a large or growing family and enthusiastic entertainers, it may be possible to reconfigure the current layout to suit the needs of your family (STCA).
A short walk to Warrien Reserve, it is perfectly placed for easy access to Croydon North shops, the bus, a choice of shopping options and the train. An idyllic life in a wonderful location will be the ultimate reward for buyers with a vision for the future and a love and respect of the past!
Insights: 5 Moss Court, Croydon North VIC 3136 was last sold in 2016 and 35 other 4 bedroom house in Croydon North have recently been sold.

Description:
Reside, renovate or rebuild (STCA)
A low-traffic crescent with nearby reserves is the setting of this 4 bedroom house. Great for families, the brick veneer house has a single-storey layout, great alfresco area and a spacious backyard on a north-facing block of 861 sq m approx.
4 robed bedrooms share 2 bathrooms. The master bedroom with a ceiling fan has a walk-in wardrobe and an ensuite, while the main bathroom has a combined shower and bath, complementing a separate toilet.
Hardwood floorboards grace the L-shaped lounge and dining room at the front of the house, complementing a spacious, slate-tiled family/meals room, overlooked by the central kitchen featuring a wall oven, dishwasher and a stainless steel gas cooktop.
The family room flows outside to a large deck, covered with a pitched roof pergola and accessing the backyard. Further inclusions: gas space and ducted heating, a split system air-conditioner and a carport.
The level, north-facing block may also suit extension or replacing of the house, with potential for development (STCA).
Walk to playgrounds at Griff Hunt and Turkeith Crescent Reserves, close to the Village School, 671 buses (Croydon station to Chirnside Park shopping centre) and Croydon North shopping centre and cafes
HIGHLIGHTS
861 sq m approx.
North-facing
Development potential (STCA)
Original hardwood floors
Covered alfresco deck
Nearby parks and playgrounds

Description:
***UNDER CONTRACT***
SETSALE: Tuesday 19th April @ 5pm (Unless Sold Prior)
Fabulously positioned in the bowl of this quality Court, nestled on approx. 2,248m2.
- Wonderfully spacious interior, everything this home has to offer will immediately attract families.
- Select from the generous living room and dining room to entertain guests in style.
- The family can relax and unwind in the substantial family and meals area adjoining the sleek, as new kitchen. A wood heater warms this entire zone along with the comfort of gas ducted heating, ducted vacuum, evaporative ducted cooling and a reverse cycle split system.
- Alfresco dining is yours to enjoy on the large undercover deck overlooking the North facing huge back garden, the perfect place for children to play.
-There is a study and handy W.I storage, powder room and spacious laundry.
- Upstairs discover the 4 robed bedrooms incorporating the main bedroom with BIRs and a modern ensuite plus a good size family bathroom.
-Highlights include 2nd reverse cycle split system air conditioner in the living room, ceiling fans, stainless steel appliances, waterfall stone bench tops, slate, polished and carpeted floors, bay windows, paved outdoor lower area, 2 water tanks, auto double garage with convenient internal access and excellent off street parking.
- Positioned in this popular location, always in demand, walk to Yarra Road Primary, near Croydon Hills Primary, Luther College, Yarra Valley Grammar, Good Shepherd and McAdam Square. Short commute to both Croydon North Plaza, Croydon shops, station, also Ringwood North and the newly expanded and improved Eastland.

Description:
LIVING LARGE
A wonderful opportunity exists to secure a large five bedroom family home with a versatile floorplan to cater for a growing family, in an ideal court location and close to quality schools, shopping and transport. Stepping into the warm timber floored entrance, you are greeted by spacious light filled living areas, a bright central kitchen, and beckoning you outside is the pitched roof entertaining deck for hours of relaxation with family and friends. With new carpets and a fresh coat of paint, this inviting family home offers four spacious robed bedrooms, master with ensuite and walk in robe, and an expansive fifth bedroom or rumpus at the rear that has a myriad of uses. It could be the home office and additional living space for the adults, a bedroom for grown up kids needing retreat space, or simply a fantastic sized rumpus for all the kids to enjoy. A short walk to Croydon Hills Primary, The Good Shedherd and Luther College, and Yarra Valley Grammar, this leafy locale is ideal for a large family looking for more space to live work and play.

Description:
Build the dream!
Plans and permits for a 3 bedroom home accompany this fantastic block with its' own street frontage that's superbly positioned for convenience. Low maintenance is a leading advantage, whilst having everything at your fingertips, including schools, shops, parks and transport options. Croydon North offers a gateway to the majestic Yarra valley with its fantastic sights and wineries as well as being 10 min drive to the newly refurbished shops at eastland. When complete this quality designed home will also provide 2 bathrooms, an open plan living environment and car accommodation. The design and position of the house provides an assortment of quality enhancements to support the reason why you choose to build from scratch. Be quick, this opportunity won't be around for long!

Description:
DEVELOPMENT OPPORTUNITY
This prime parcel of land, situated on a massive near level 1044 sqm (approx) allotment provides an exceptional and lucrative investment opportunity for the astute developer and investor. With the recent sub-division boom blocks of this size zoned as General Residential Zone 1 (GRZ1), are a rare find. Offering enough space for 3 units or townhouses (STCA), with the added bonus of rear and side boundaries bordering parkland, this is an outstanding opportunity to snap up a great location that won't last long.
This home is equally appealing to owner occupiers who want to take advantage of a large block for family enjoyment or to live in while you contemplate the property's future. The home has 2 large living zones, a modern stainless appointed kitchen with an adjoining meals zone, 3 bedrooms, an updated family bathroom, ducted heating, evaporative cooling, sleek timber floors and carpet as well as a remote double garage and garden shed.
This home provides a convenient location to Eastlink, Eastland shopping centre, Chirnside Park, Luther College, Oxley College, Yarra Valley Grammar, bus services and easy access to the Yarra Valley winery region.
You will need to be quick to secure this investment opportunity.

Description:
***UNDER CONTRACT***
Your family will adore the easy indoor/outdoor lifestyle that this beautifully presented brick veneer home has to offer. Designed for everyday functionality and comfort, covered decking providing a seamless link from indoors to the large garden showcasing established shade trees. An outstanding home offering close proximity to quality schools, transport and the beautiful Yarra Valley.
- Well-presented family home on 707m2 in a popular Croydon North locale
- Mature landscaping creates a great first impression and adds to the street appeal of the home
- The bright interior enjoys a neutral colour scheme, modern carpet and plenty of natural light
- Relax and unwind in the spacious lounge with dual aspect windows, including one beautiful bay window
- The central kitchen features wall oven, gas cooking, great storage and views of the garden and deck
- Family will gather in the casual meals/family room that links to a covered alfresco deck via glass doors
- There are also 3 robed bedrooms (master with walk in robe and ensuite), family bathroom with separate WC, and laundry with garden access
- The beautiful rear garden is highlighted by mature deciduous trees, including Silver Birch and Gleditsia, plus lots of lawn and plenty of room for kids to play
- Additional features include ducted heating, split system air conditioning, ducted vacuum, watering system, secure fencing and garage with rear roller door for van/trailer storage
